p.k: Blood Money True crime documentary series following determined investigators as they piece together events during the critical 24-hour window after a crime
New. Bonfire of Blood A neighbourly feud over road access ends in a murder that rocked a Californian town to its core
Rearview Mirror When a retired military man runs over a pedestrian, it's up to lieutenant Joe Kenda to determine if it was an accident or cold-blooded murder
My, My, Merry Christmas Joe Kenda solves the baffling murder of a popular man in Colorado Springs when his enquiries lead him to a relative with a long criminal history
81% Bloody Valentine/Storm Warning A young father is shot dead in Tulsa, and a home invasion leaves one teenager killed and two wounded in Atlanta
81% Shattered Glass Detective Greg Johnson fights to prove he has enough evidence to convict a man he believes beat a young mother to death in her New Orleans home
Last Dance A look at how Virginia detectives used science and cunning to catch the killer of 16-year-old ballet dancer Meghan Landowski in 2008

n.u: Suzy Lamplugh: Crimes That Shook Britain

p.n: Suzy Lamplugh: Crimes That Shook Britain VI (6)
p.k: A look at the case of estate agent Suzy Lamplugh, who showed a client round a house in Fulham in July 1986 and was never seen again. Dermot Murnaghan hosts
A Walk In The Dark The tragic story of Rachel Moran, who went missing on New Year's Day, 2004, sparking a mass police search in Hull which would
The Other Woman: The police send a salesman undercover when the girlfriend of their colleague goes shopping for a hit man - but the operation quickly
Jekyll & Hyde Lieutenant Joe Kenda looks for answers in the death of a young man stabbed and left for dead on the roadside. Meanwhile, a woman is shot in the face
Preying On The Innocent When the son of a prominent politician is murdered in his basement, Lt Joe Kenda feels pressure from City Hall to solve the case
A Predator in Deerfield A young mum and her six-month baby vanish in a quiet neighbourhood. For investigators and locals, it's the start of a terrifying murder mystery
Speed Freak Killers A drug-fuelled killing spree terrorises a small California town. Police believe they are dealing with a serial killer who lives quietly among them
Mysogynist Murderer Detectives in a small Australian town attempt to track down a sadistic killer when residents start finding bodies of dead women in rural locations
Documentary series exposing murderers who have brazenly shown their faces on TV and in the media while secretly knowing they had blood on their hands

Lies, Lawns & Murder An almighty neighbourhood feud ignites in North Carolina when a retired Vietnam veteran sells off a piece of his land to a young family
